snp4.16:955: "Na me diṭṭho ito pubbe,Na suto uda kassaci;Evaṁ vagguvado satthā,Tusitā gaṇimāgato.
snp4.16:956: Sadevakassa lokassa,yathā dissati cakkhumā;Sabbaṁ tamaṁ vinodetvā,ekova ratimajjhagā.
snp4.16:957: Taṁ buddhaṁ asitaṁ tādiṁ,akuhaṁ gaṇimāgataṁ;Bahūnamidha baddhānaṁ,atthi pañhena āgamaṁ.
snp4.16:958: Bhikkhuno vijigucchato,bhajato rittamāsanaṁ;Rukkhamūlaṁ susānaṁ vā,pabbatānaṁ guhāsu vā.
snp4.16:959: Uccāvacesu sayanesu,kīvanto tattha bheravā;Yehi bhikkhu na vedheyya,nigghose sayanāsane.
snp4.16:960: Katī parissayā loke,gacchato agataṁ disaṁ;Ye bhikkhu abhisambhave,pantamhi sayanāsane.
snp4.16:961: Kyāssa byappathayo assu,kyāssassu idha gocarā;Kāni sīlabbatānāssu,pahitattassa bhikkhuno.
snp4.16:962: Kaṁ so sikkhaṁ samādāya,ekodi nipako sato;Kammāro rajatasseva,niddhame malamattano".
snp4.16:963: "Vijigucchamānassa yadidaṁ phāsu,Rittāsanaṁ sayanaṁ sevato ce;Sambodhikāmassa yathānudhammaṁ,Taṁ te pavakkhāmi yathā pajānaṁ.
snp4.16:964: Pañcannaṁ dhīro bhayānaṁ na bhāye,Bhikkhu sato sapariyantacārī;Ḍaṁsādhipātānaṁ sarīsapānaṁ,Manussaphassānaṁ catuppadānaṁ.
snp4.16:965: Paradhammikānampi na santaseyya,Disvāpi tesaṁ bahubheravāni;Athāparāni abhisambhaveyya,Parissayāni kusalānuesī.
snp4.16:966: Ātaṅkaphassena khudāya phuṭṭho,Sītaṁ athuṇhaṁ adhivāsayeyya;So tehi phuṭṭho bahudhā anoko,Viriyaṁ parakkammadaḷhaṁ kareyya.
snp4.16:967: Theyyaṁ na kāre na musā bhaṇeyya,Mettāya phasse tasathāvarāni;Yadāvilattaṁ manaso vijaññā,Kaṇhassa pakkhoti vinodayeyya.
snp4.16:968: Kodhātimānassa vasaṁ na gacche,Mūlampi tesaṁ palikhañña tiṭṭhe;Athappiyaṁ vā pana appiyaṁ vā,Addhā bhavanto abhisambhaveyya.
snp4.16:969: Paññaṁ purakkhatvā kalyāṇapīti,Vikkhambhaye tāni parissayāni;Aratiṁ sahetha sayanamhi pante,Caturo sahetha paridevadhamme.
snp4.16:970: Kiṁsū asissāmi kuva vā asissaṁ,Dukkhaṁ vata settha kvajja sessaṁ;Ete vitakke paridevaneyye,Vinayetha sekho aniketacārī.
snp4.16:971: Annañca laddhā vasanañca kāle,Mattaṁ so jaññā idha tosanatthaṁ;So tesu gutto yatacāri gāme,Rusitopi vācaṁ pharusaṁ na vajjā.
snp4.16:972: Okkhittacakkhu na ca pādalolo,Jhānānuyutto bahujāgarassa;Upekkhamārabbha samāhitatto,Takkāsayaṁ kukkucciyūpachinde.
snp4.16:973: Cudito vacībhi satimābhinande,Sabrahmacārīsu khilaṁ pabhinde;Vācaṁ pamuñce kusalaṁ nātivelaṁ,Janavādadhammāya na cetayeyya.
snp4.16:974: Athāparaṁ pañca rajāni loke,Yesaṁ satīmā vinayāya sikkhe;Rūpesu saddesu atho rasesu,Gandhesu phassesu sahetha rāgaṁ.
snp4.16:975: Etesu dhammesu vineyya chandaṁ,Bhikkhu satimā suvimuttacitto;Kālena so sammā dhammaṁ parivīmaṁsamāno,Ekodibhūto vihane tamaṁ so"ti.
